# generated by compiler
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.2)
include($ENV{COREVA_SOFTWARE}/streamit.cmake)
include($ENV{COREVA_SOFTWARE}/streamit.cmake)
option(COREVA_TOOLCHAIN "Use the CoreVA toolchain" ON)
if(COREVA_TOOLCHAIN)
  set(CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE $ENV{COREVA_SOFTWARE}/toolchain.cmake)
  add_definitions("-DCOREVA")
endif()
project(Streamit-CoreVA-Software C ASM)
init_streamit_cmake()
